Author: samaile
Text: ive only been there for five months and ive been able to hide it pretty well. i was definitely better right at the beginning but i think its just because i was "meant to be happy" to have received such an amazing opportunity and my whole social circle was excited tor me. sometimes i have panic attacks, cry, b/p several times a day at work but they never seem to notice it as i make sure i do it hidden. as to my job, i was recruited by my government as a security politics analyst but im afraid i cant really say more about my work.

Author: anonymouseds
Text: How long have you been at your job? Mental health can change with time - someone could be completely mentally stable when hired, then life happens and they can start having mental health issues. What type of work is it?
